name: On The Grid Off The Grid (obriencole)
name_original: On The Grid Off The Grid (obriencole)
description:
An unfinished prototype based upon the game cover "On the Grid Off the Grid" . This build is meant to demonstrate the puzzle design and gameplay, but does not represent the pasing/flow of the final version. No final art assets have been implemented. With that in mind, feedback is appreciated!

Controls:

Movement: arrows
Enter grid - space
Undo - Z
Reset - R
